name: Shell Sweet Shell
description:
This game was made for the Global Games Jam 2019 and was developed using Unity. The theme was "Home", so we decided to make a game where a turtle uses its home to get back to its family. 

Abilities:

Shell Throw- Throw your shell at enemies to defeat them.

Shell Wings- Use your wings to slow down your decent

Shell Armor- hide inside your shell and become indestructible

Shell Slide- slide using your shell to avoid obstacles

The game has a timer, the faster you make your way through the level (only level), the higher your points will be at the end. Play with your friends and see who can get the highest score between yourselves!
